export.name: Speak: Common
export.description: Ability to understand and speak common. Typically everyone speaks this.

export.name: Speak: Dwarvian
export.description: Ability to understand and speak dwarvish

export.name: Speak: Elvish
export.description: Ability to understand and speak elvish

export.name: Speak: Gnomish
export.description: Ability to understand and speak gnomish

export.name: Speak: Goblin
export.description: You are able to speak the language of goblins.

export.name: Speak: Draconic
export.description: Ability to understand and speak the language of dragons

export.name: Speak: Undercommon
export.description: Ability to understand and speak the language common to those who dwell beneath the surface of society.

export.name: Weaponry: Exotic
export.description: Allows use of 'odd' or 'uncommon' weapons

export.name: Weaponry: Heavy
export.description: You know how to use extremely heavy weaponry.

export.name: Speak: Celestial
export.description:
Ability to understand and speak the language of gods.

Can not be read through lip reading.

export.name: Speak: Abyssal
export.description:
Ability to understand and speak the language of the demons.

Can not be read through lip reading.

export.name: Speak with Animals
export.description:
Ability to understand and speak with common animals like cows, horses, panthers.

Does not extend to "monster" creatures or other non-animal entities.

export.name: Wear: Enchanted Robes
export.description: While non-magical robes can be worn by anyone, magical robes have a different tone to donning them.

export.name: Play: Percussion
export.description:
You are proficient with drums and percussion like instruments, being able to play them.

This merely means you can play them consistently in a pleasant way. You are still subject to your performance skill check, which this does not directly impact.

export.name: Speak: Aquan
export.description: You are able to speak the language of the merfolk.

export.name: Play: Strings
export.description:
You are proficient with string instruments, being able to play them.

This merely means you can play them consistently in a pleasant way. You are still subject to your performance skill check, which this does not directly impact.

export.name: Play: Pianos
export.description:
You are proficient with pianos and piano like instruments, being able to play them.

This merely means you can play them consistently in a pleasant way. You are still subject to your performance skill check, which this does not directly impact.

export.name: Play: Woodwinds
export.description:
You are proficient with woodwind instruments, being able to play them.

This merely means you can play them consistently in a pleasant way. You are still subject to your performance skill check, which this does not directly impact.

export.name: Speak: Sylvan
export.description: Understand and speak an ancient elven dialect.

export.name: Speak: Orc
export.description: Ability to understand and speak the language of the Orcs.

export.name: Speak: Kintarian
export.description: You are able to speak the language of the Kintari.

export.name: Speak: Giant
export.description: Ability to understand and speak the language of the Giants.

export.name: Speak: Druidic
export.description: A special language learned in training.

export.name: Speak: Merfolk
export.description:
You are able to speak and understand Merfolkian, the language of the water creatures.

This allows you to speak to intelligent water creatures such as mermen and mermaids and to have some vague understanding of unintelligent water creatures to ask for things like help or directions.

export.name: Task: Nautical Navigation
export.description:
Reading the stars is the key to navigating the open waters. A touch of the arcane and a map doesn't hurt.

You know how to combine these traits to plot a course across the open seas.

export.name: Task: Sailboat Captain
export.description:
You understand how a sailboat works and how to command a crew on a larger vessel.

Important for smooth operation of large sailboats.
You know that a different sizes of ships have different desired crews.

# Small Sailing Vessels

These require very few crew to operate but only hold a small amount.
+ Generally not recommended for sailing on the open seas
+ 1 to 2 Crew to operate
+ General max of 4 people actively working the rigging
+ Up to 8 people on the ship

# Medium Sailing Vessels

This is where most boats from ${"content":"Draconia","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ fall.
+ Minimum crew of 3 to operate
     + Works well enough in coastal waters
+ Optimum operation begins at 5 crew, particularly on the open seas
+ Works best with 8 crew, and comfortably with 10
+ Can generally carry up to 25 people on board

# Large Sailing Vessels

Many of this class sail under the flag of ${"content":"Nautregno", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$. And while other nations have them as well, they typically serving as flagships in those cases.
+ Minimum crew of 15
+ Works best with a crew of 30
+ Can generally carry up to 80 people on board

export.name: Speak: Ancient
export.description:
Ability to understand and speak the language of the ancient civilization.

A combination of Celestial, Infernal, and Deep Speech. Aquan is needed to tie together the different usages to fully grasp the language. And even then, it still must be learned.

Can not be read through lip reading.

Can not be gained or read through the use of Comprehend Languages.

export.name: Speak: Infernal
export.description:
Infernal was the language of the Baatezu, a subtype of devils, and of the Great Hell Plains.

Infernal was brought to the world through contact with evil beings from other planes. It was described as harsh and alien in nature, since it developed among beings devoid of humanity.

Can not be read through lip reading.

export.name: Speak: Primordial
export.description:
The native language of beings like gods, and once worshiped as such, but different from those who walk the planes considered to be those of the Celestials.

These ancient beings fought as those on the Material Plane do, but also fought to conquer land in other planes with great abandon.

Losing their stature and mostly resigned to their own Plane, they can occasionally be found wandering existence.

Can not be read through lip reading.

export.name: Speak: Deep Speech
export.description:
Language of aberrations, an alien form of communication originating in the Far Realms. It had no native script of its own, but when written by mortals it used the Espruar script, as it was first transcribed by the Drow due to frequent contact between the two groups stemming from living in relatively close proximity within the Underdark.

Known to be commonly spoken by Cthulhian followers.

Can not be read through lip reading.

export.name: Speak: Auran
export.description: Auran was a breathy, relaxed language that has been described as a slow exhaling of air. It was considered a dialect of Primordial, so that creatures who spoke one of the other elemental dialects such as Aquan, Ignan or Terran could understand Auran and vice-versa. As the language of the air, it also tends to be spoken by avian or air faring creatures in the material plane such as the Kenku, sometimes called the Bird People, or more intelligent Air Elementals.
